channel.title: Compile problems
channel.description:
whenever i open my compile.bat it says this
'hootnscape.no-ip.info' is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file the system cannot find the program specified. the system cannot find the program specified. press any key to continue...
wats wrong and how do i fix it?

item.title: Compile problems
item.dc:creator: @Yakooza Yakooza
item.description:
@Yakooza wrote:

right click compile.bat and click edit and put this in it

@echo off
color 0a
title Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Compile problems
item.dc:creator: @darkhazzard darkhazzard
item.description:
@darkhazzard wrote:

download the latest version of java

Read full topic
